QuestData.Title: The Poisoned Mind
QuestData.Description: Before we return to Klaxxi'vess, I wish to look upon the empire.$B$BThe Klaxxi Council told me that the enemy gathers outside the Empress's palace.$B$BMy poisons are ready. What better way to announce my return than with death and destruction?$B$BJust be careful not to mix the two serums... at least not while you're holding the vessels.$B$BSpeak to me when you are ready to fly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Xaril the Poisoned Mind. Kill 200 mantid and 3 kunchong while flying with him.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Xaril the Poisoned Mind
